feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing multiple UI and asset-related feature requirements with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text map of frontend file paths to short descriptions of their roles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and theme variables including color, layout, and dark mode values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with Home, For Farmers, and Contact routes using SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/MorshidButton.ts: Button wrapper enforcing rounded corners and consistent styling around shadcn Button.
frontend/src/components/MorshidCard.tsx: Card wrapper adding consistent border, shadow, and optional top border color accent.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with MORSHID branding, contact info, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with navigation links highlighting active route.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFloating: Floating WhatsApp contact button fixed to bottom-right.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication context and provider handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Global brand-focused styles defining MORSHID color tokens and base theme using Tailwind.
frontend/src/layouts/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout with header, footer, routed content outlet, and floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, rendering the App component into the root element.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the Contact page with three contact method cards (WhatsApp, Email, Location) and a response-time note.
frontend/src/pages/ForFarmersPage.tsx: Builds the For Farmers page with a hero section, service cards, and FAQ/CTA sections using icons and WhatsApp links.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the Home page with a hero banner, key feature sections, and CTA buttons linking to WhatsApp support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and MORSHID theme extensions.
project_state.json: Tracks project requirements, constraints, known issues, and scope updates for the MORSHID website build.
